mapper.select: select e.id id, e.name name, e.age age, e.gender gender, e.birthday birthday, e.IDCard IDCard, e.wedlock wedlock, e.nationId nationId, e.nativePlace nativePlace, e.email email, e.phone phone, e.address address, e.deptId deptId, e.posId posId, e.degree degree,e.school school, e.edate edate, e.workState workState, e.workID workID,e.conversionTime conversionTime,e.workAge workAge,e.notWorkDate notWorkDate ,d.id did, d.name deptname, p.id pid, p.name posname from emp e,dept d,position p where e.deptId=d.id and e.posId=p.id and e.id=#{id}
